titles.name: Acrobat
titles.description: Add a negative d6 to all engage attacks made on you

titles.name: Spider
titles.description: Gain a d6 on all acrobat rolls an increase your movement speed by 10

titles.name: Dancer
titles.description: Add a second agility die when you dodge

titles.name: Black Widow
titles.description: You can choose to not make noise when you move

titles.name: Jumping Spider
titles.description: You don't have to make a check trees or other rough surfaces (buildings, etc.)

titles.name: Smoke Dancer
titles.description: You can not be targeted by engage attacks, increase your movement speed by 15, and add a negative d4 to all attacks made on you

titles.name: Water Dancer
titles.description: Eac htime an attack misses you, move 15 feet in any direction and push the attacker

titles.name: Calvary
titles.description: You only need one hand to ride a beast

titles.name: Kennel Master
titles.description: Gain a d8 on handling animals smaller than you

titles.name: Cataphract
titles.description: Your mount gains 2d8 on all confidence rolls

titles.name: Hussar
titles.description: Your mount doubles its movement speed

titles.name: Shepard
titles.description: When you command, you may command a number of animals smaller than you equal to the number of successes on your command roll

titles.name: Beastmaster
titles.description: Choose a beast you have a good relationship with, that beast will attempt to do anything you tell it to do
